# Platform Toolkit Records

This folder contains a snapshot of the platformToolkit repository from:
- **Repository**: https://github.com/leonix33/plaformToolkit.git
- **Date Copied**: November 30, 2025
- **Tag**: v1.0.0
- **Branch**: main

## Purpose
This is a local record/backup of the platformToolkit repository content for reference and integration purposes with the Threat Detection Pipeline project.

## Git Setup
- Remote name: `platformtoolkit`
- Local branch: `platformtoolkit` (tracks `platformtoolkit/main`)

## Commands Used
```bash
git remote add platformtoolkit https://github.com/leonix33/plaformToolkit.git
git fetch platformtoolkit
git checkout -b platformtoolkit platformtoolkit/main
```

## Integration Notes
This platformToolkit can be integrated with the main Threat Detection Pipeline for enhanced monitoring and platform management capabilities.
